Robert Schumann

Albumblätter, op. 124

1832–1845

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 28'

  • 1. Impromptu
  • 2. Leides Ahnung
  • 3. Scherzino
  • 4. Walzer
  • 5. Phantasietanz
  • 6. Wiegenliedchen
  • 7. Ländler
  • 8. Leid ohne Ende
  • 9. Impromptu
  • 10. Walzer
  • 11. Romanze
  • 12. Burla
  • 13. Larghetto
  • 14. Vision
  • 15. Walzer
  • 16. Schlummerlied
  • 17. Elfe
  • 18. Botschaft
  • 19. Phantasiestück
  • 20. Canon

This is a collection of pieces written over multiple years.

yearpiece
1832–1833nos. 1, 3, 12–13 and 15
1835nos. 2, 4, 11 and 17
1836nos. 5 and 7
1837nos. 8 and 10
1838nos. 9, 14 and 18
1838 or 1839no. 19
1841no. 16
1843no. 6
1845no. 20

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/6 · RSA 1021-10 · ed. Michael Beiche / Timo Evers
  • Associated Board · Sixteen Albumleaves · ed. Howard Ferguson [nos. 2, 4–8, 13, 15–17 and 19]
  • Henle · HN 930 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band VI · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Robert Münster / Wolf-Dieter Seiffert
  • Henle · HN 931 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band VI · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Robert Münster / Wolf-Dieter Seiffert
  • Henle · HN 82 · ed. Ernst Herttrich

1. Impromptu

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 3

2. Leides Ahnung

This piece was originally the fifth variation of the second version of the Etüden in Form freier Variationen über ein Thema von Beethoven (Anh. F25).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Scherzino

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Walzer

This piece was originally written for inclusion in Carnaval (op. 9).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

5. Phantasietanz

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

6. Wiegenliedchen

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5

7. Ländler

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

8. Leid ohne Ende

This piece was originally written for inclusion in the Fantasiestücke (op. 12).

Duration: 3'

Difficulty: 2

9. Impromptu

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

10. Walzer

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

11. Romanze

This piece was originally written for inclusion in Carnaval (op. 9).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

12. Burla

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 3

13. Larghetto

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

14. Vision

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

15. Walzer

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2

16. Schlummerlied

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

17. Elfe

This piece was originally written for inclusion in Carnaval (op. 9).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3

18. Botschaft

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

19. Phantasiestück

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3

20. Canon

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2
